Each creature in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] must succeed at a @Check[reflex|against:exemplar|basic] save against your class DC or take spirit damage equal to your normal Strike damage with your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Hands of the Wildling].

You can choose to swing with abandon, which imposes a â€“2 circumstance bonus to enemies' saving throws, but causes you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the start of your next turn.
